front.title: IEEE Standards Interpretations for IEEE Standard Portable Operating System Interface for Computer Environments (IEEE Std 1003.1-1988)

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: The Technical Committee on operating systems and application environments of the IEEE Computer Society carried out a series of analyses of various problems encountered by users of IEEE Std 1003.1-1988, IEEE standard portable operating system interface for computer environments. The results of its deliberations are presented. The intent is to give the POSIX community reasonable ways of interpreting the unclear portions of the standard.<>
